title: Why do I have worse teams in gold?
body:
Like, in silver (and bronze this season, since we all got put way lower), I had far better teams than I do in gold. Every game, there's someone feeding, or a troll, or someone AFKing, or someone "lagging", or someone who keeps DCing... and meanwhile the enemy team is stupidly coordinated, and none of them feed.

I don't understand it.

replies.body: Gold V? Every V division is absolute shit, it is just populated by the people that got promoted and think they are amazing, plus the people that think they can stop making an effort and just troll/flame/afk now that they hit gold.
Well, I was silver V for a while. Still better teams than what I'm getting now. >.>
Why is it always "ME ME ME" eh?
Every 5 division is painful. Once you grind out, it's so much better.
seems like its all of rank regardless of the rank... welcome to online games and welcome to league of assclowns
